languages.text: "Узнаю кровь старины Абеляра — не видишь дальше своего носа, дорогая Клеменциа. Это не взятка, это подарок! А что до печати..."

traits.locale_text: "Узнаю кровь старины Абеляра — не видишь дальше своего носа, дорогая Клеменциа. Это не взятка, это подарок! А что до печати..."

languages.text: "I can see the family resemblance with Abelard now — you cannot see farther than your own nose, my dear Clementia. It wasn't a bribe, it was a gift! Now about that seal..."
languages.original_text: "Узнаю кровь старины Абеляра — не видишь дальше своего носа, дорогая Клеменциа. Это не взятка, это подарок! А что до печати..."

traits.locale_text: "I can see the family resemblance with Abelard now — you cannot see farther than your own nose, my dear Clementia. It wasn't a bribe, it was a gift! Now about that seal..."
"I can see the family resemblance with Abelard now — you cannot see farther than your own nose, my dear Clementia. It wasn't a bribe, it was a gift! Now about that seal..."
"I can see the family resemblance with Abelard now — you cannot see farther than your own nose, my dear Clementia. It wasn't a bribe, it was a gift! Now about that seal..."
"I can see the family resemblance with Abelard now — you cannot see farther than your own nose, my dear Clementia. It wasn't a bribe, it was a gift! Now about that seal..."

languages.text: “我现在算是知道了，你和阿贝拉德可真是一家人。你们的见识实在是短浅得可怜，我亲爱的克莱门缇雅。那根本不是什么贿赂，而是礼物！至于印章的事情……”
languages.original_text: "I can see the family resemblance with Abelard now — you cannot see farther than your own nose, my dear Clementia. It wasn't a bribe, it was a gift! Now about that seal..."

traits.locale_text: “我现在算是知道了，你和阿贝拉德可真是一家人。你们的见识实在是短浅得可怜，我亲爱的克莱门缇雅。那根本不是什么贿赂，而是礼物！至于印章的事情……”

languages.text: «Ahora se me hace más evidente su parentesco con Abelard: es incapaz de ver las cosas como son, mi querida Clementia. ¡No era un soborno, era un regalo! Bueno, sobre ese sello...».
languages.original_text: "I can see the family resemblance with Abelard now — you cannot see farther than your own nose, my dear Clementia. It wasn't a bribe, it was a gift! Now about that seal..."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora se me hace más evidente su parentesco con Abelard: es incapaz de ver las cosas como son, mi querida Clementia. ¡No era un soborno, era un regalo! Bueno, sobre ese sello...».

languages.text: 「アベラルドの家族だから似てたのね、やっと分かったわ。人は自分の鼻より先は見えないものよ、クレメンティア。これは賄賂じゃなくて、プレゼント！というわけで印章を、ね…」
languages.original_text: "I can see the family resemblance with Abelard now — you cannot see farther than your own nose, my dear Clementia. It wasn't a bribe, it was a gift! Now about that seal..."

traits.locale_text: 「アベラルドの家族だから似てたのね、やっと分かったわ。人は自分の鼻より先は見えないものよ、クレメンティア。これは賄賂じゃなくて、プレゼント！というわけで印章を、ね…」

languages.text: « Décidément, c'est de famille. Tout comme Abélard, vous ne voyez pas plus loin que le bout de votre nez, ma chère Clémentia. C'était un cadeau, pas un pot-de-vin ! Et pour en revenir à ce sceau... »
languages.original_text: "I can see the family resemblance with Abelard now — you cannot see farther than your own nose, my dear Clementia. It wasn't a bribe, it was a gift! Now about that seal..."

traits.locale_text: « Décidément, c'est de famille. Tout comme Abélard, vous ne voyez pas plus loin que le bout de votre nez, ma chère Clémentia. C'était un cadeau, pas un pot-de-vin ! Et pour en revenir à ce sceau... »

languages.text: "Ich erkenne jetzt de Familienähnlichkeit mit Abelard – Ihr könnt nicht weiter sehen als bis zu Eurer eigenen Nasenspitze, werte Clementia. Das war keine Bestechung, das war ein Geschenk! Und wegen dies Siegels ..."
languages.original_text: "I can see the family resemblance with Abelard now — you cannot see farther than your own nose, my dear Clementia. It wasn't a bribe, it was a gift! Now about that seal..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erkenne jetzt de Familienähnlichkeit mit Abelard – Ihr könnt nicht weiter sehen als bis zu Eurer eigenen Nasenspitze, werte Clementia. Das war keine Bestechung, das war ein Geschenk! Und wegen dies Siegels ..."

languages.text: "Artık Abelard'la aranızdaki ailevi benzerliği görebiliyorum... Çok dar fikirlisin sevgili Clementia. Rüşvet değil, hediyeydi o! Şimdi şu mühür konusuna dönecek olursak..."
languages.original_text: "I can see the family resemblance with Abelard now — you cannot see farther than your own nose, my dear Clementia. It wasn't a bribe, it was a gift! Now about that seal..."

traits.locale_text: "Artık Abelard'la aranızdaki ailevi benzerliği görebiliyorum... Çok dar fikirlisin sevgili Clementia. Rüşvet değil, hediyeydi o! Şimdi şu mühür konusuna dönecek olursak..."
